author: A D Balasubramaniyan
text:
A young woman killed her one-and-a-half year old child and herself by jumping into a farm well on Tuesday.

According to the police, Venda (25) wife of Muniyan, a lorry driver, and theri one-and-a-half year old child Rithik were living in Thirunakatchi village in Melathikkan village near here.

Both of them were alone at home when Muniyan was away on a outstation lorry trip.

Her in laws, a working couple, found their daughter-in-law and grand child missing when they returned home.

The family went out searching for them but in vain.

In a farm well

But on Wednesday morning someone noticed the corpse of baby Rithik floating in a farm well in the village. Fire and rescue service personnel immediately rushed to the spot and launched an intensive search.

Later they found the body of Venda too in the same well.

Muniyan and Venda were married only two-and-a-half years ago and it is suspected that a family feud may have driven Venda to take the extreme step.

The Tiruvannamalai taluk police have booked a case and are conducting enquiries.
title: Woman kills child, commits suicide
